name: Automated Customer Service Ticketing System
description: This pattern automates the creation, allocation, and management of customer service tickets. It captures a customer's name, email, and contact number for follow-ups and operates end-to-end within a digital framework.

required_integrations: I don&#x27;t have any software, you decide what I should do

llm_insights: Designing an efficient ticket allocation algorithm
llm_challenges: Designing an efficient ticket allocation algorithm
llm_recommended_approach: Utilize serverless architecture with AWS Lambda for creating and updating tickets, store data securely in DynamoDB with encryption, and use AWS SES for sending out ticket information to contacts. Leverage API Gateway to handle incoming queues and trigger events.
